data.text: They have various menu, good taste (local, oriental, and western menus), excellent service, nice ambience. We'd like to back again to this restaurant and this hotel.

data.text: Gugum is very friendly and helpful. His service is very good. Service is 100! polite and always ready to serve

data.text: Great service mbak destiya, mbak nazwa dan mas ilman. good food, yummy breakfast. Suasana restaurant ok.
data.title: Breakfast

data.text: I was there because there was a bargain real. Initially not my first choice since teh city offers many good restaurant. But it was the best choice. The food super delicious and the staff was very helpful! Definetely will come back again.
data.title: Best dinner in Bandung

data.text: Staying at The Papandayan for 2 days. It was great. Breakfast at Pago Restaurant is nice. They provide various east and western food. The team is friendly and helpful.
data.title: Great atmosphere

data.text: excellent menu variance, great hospitality and service, serve good coffee as well , covid protocol still maintained well
data.title: Great!

data.text: I really love the service and i really love the sushi cause it was so nice and so deicious. And the hotelier was so cute and nice. And i love the prange juice to! So nice
